body:
SOFFOCHIAMO IL FASCISMO *(Let’s suffocate fascism)* originated with the Federazione Anarchica Toscana, a subset of the Federazione Anarchica Italiana based in Carrara, Italy. The original woodcut poster included additional text: 

> Il fascismo, arma più feroce del capitale, si impose in Spagna con l’uccisione in massa, si è mantenuto con la violenza e oggi si riconferma con l’assassinio politico. FERMIAMO LA MANO DEL BOIA FRANCO!
>
> *(Fascism, the fiercest weapon of the capital, was imposed in Spain with mass killing, was sustained with violence, and today is reconfirmed with political assassination. LET’S STOP THE HAND OF THE EXECUTIONER FRANCO!).*
sourceText:
**Sources**

“Soffochiamo Il Fascismo,” *Autistici/Iventati*.

*Source image from “Archivio il sessantotto." Vectorized by SIGNSIGNSIGNS.*
title: SOFFOCHIAMO IL FASCISMO
